page.title: 08Leisure and Recreation
page.content: We did a survey to find out just how adults and children liked to spend their spare time. Out of all the adults that we interviewed, a large number said they enjoyed gardening as a hobby both from the point of view of getting exercise whilst at the same time receiving the benefits of producing their own fresh vegetables. A large proportion of the adults do take part in various sports activities which improves their fitness from the exercise they get and from the social life these activities provide through meeting and joining in with other people at the clubs or pubs afterwards. A good number of adults enjoy D I Y hobbies and about half enjoyed music and walking but only a few admitted spending much time watching television
